name: Ganga Bishnu Mund
content: G B Mund - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com G B Mund G B Mund G B Mund ProfessorG B Mund earned his Ph. D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Kharagpur. He has over 27 years of teaching / research experience. He joined Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (KIIT) in the year 1997.
